private Bitmap getBitmapFromAsset(String strName) {
		AssetManager assetManager = getAssets();
		InputStream istr = null;
		try {
			istr = assetManager.open(strName);
		} catch (IOException e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		Bitmap bitmap = BitmapFactory.decodeStream(istr);
		return bitmap;
	}
